short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the best news & search bar in your homepage with our extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser homepage into an all-in-one news hub with our extension!

Stay informed and up-to-date with the latest global news and updates, without ever leaving your browser homepage. Our user-friendly news-oriented homepage offers access to the world's top news sources, making sure you never miss a beat.

Experience a rich search experience and have social media shortcuts at your fingertips, all while staying up-to-date with news and special updates.

For effortless access, we recommend pinning our extension to your browser toolbar. Stay connected and informed with just a click!

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the ToTranslate News extension, and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://news.to-translate.net/pages/terms.html
and Privacy Policy https://news.to-translate.net/pages/privacy.html
